name: Shootout (Czaruk)
description:
Welcome to Shootout!

The legend says that nobody in the desert town of Madisonville would be able to outrun the ruling hand of justice. Every criminal used to tremble at the thought of this legendary sheriff. His name was Long John. 
One hundred years after his death some magical power has brought him and his partner Old Billy back to life - but they weren't the only ones who got resurrected.

-= GAMEPLAY =-

Your goal is to finish all of the enemies in a limited amount of moves. Careful though, you cannot die in the process!
You have to plan all your moves out beforehand and either press space or click the play icon on your screen to see if your solution was right.

-= CONTROLS =-

All of the actions except for resetting your moves can be done with your mouse on screen.
To plan a shot on an enemy you have to click on his body and it will turn grey if the move has been confirmed.
To plan a movement you have to click on a white tile and the "Ghost" will be placed down where the new position is.
Additional keybinds:
- R - Reset all moves
- Spacebar - Play out moves
- Enter - Skip dialogue
- Right mouse button - Hold to rotate the camera
